briefTitle: Metastatic Breast Cancer in Brazil: Characterization of Patients and Treatments
officialTitle: Metastatic Breast Cancer in Brazil: Characterization of Patients and Treatments
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Description of sociodemographic and socioeconomics characteristics associated to diagnostic and treatment of metastatic breast cancer in Brazil
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women \> 18 years old
* Patients diagnosed with de novo or recurrent metastatic breast cancer during the period of January to December 2012
* Any invasive breast cancer histology and subtype

Exclusion Criteria:

* Male breast cancer
